caption.p: Dive characteristics in relation to sea-ice concentration. ( a) Maximum depth (n = 67, R² = 0.26, p < 0.001, y = −0.40x + 21.7). ( b) Proportion of shallow dives (n = 67, R² = 0.40, p < 0.001, y = 1.68x + 5.74). ( c) Dive duration (n = 67, R² = 0.38, p < 0.001, y = −0.91x + 63.0). ( d) Number of dives per 24 h (n = 61, R² = 0.26, p < 0.001, y = 9.6x + 226.8). ( e) Time underwater (n = 61, R² = 0.09, p = 0.02, y = 0.31x + 17.0). ( f) Time spent flying (n = 53, R² = 0.12, p = 0.01, y = −0.62x + 38.0).
